quest.name: A Feast to Remember
journal:
The Adventurers' Guild investigator has someone to introduce to you.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The investigator introduces you to Marke, an expert on the occult sent by the guild to assist you in apprehending the Scarlet Snout. After sharing a brief explanation on the nature of the so-called Night of Devilry, he presents you with two of his prized inventions that he hopes will serve to make your journey much less precarious. Properly equipped, you prepare to make for the Scarlet Snout's domain and steel yourself for the battle ahead.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

The Scarlet Snout informs you that the feast is now ready to welcome visitors. Equipped with the tools you need to ensure your safety in the spectral realm, you go to seek out the harlequin guide under the Bentbranch Meadows bridge or in the Acorn Orchard, that you might be shown to the banquet. Once you have completed your business at the Phantoms' Feast, the Adventurers' Guild investigator will be eagerly awaiting evidence of your experience there in the form of one of the pumpkin cookies the Snout is said to be distributing to his guests.

You regale the Adventurers' Guild investigator with a tale of your time at the feast. He thanks you for your efforts, and assures you that he has warned the other invitees not to take the Snout up on his offer, so that there will be no further victims. Assured that the denizens of Gridania are safe from the red-nosed fiend's trickery, you consider paying the festivities another visit or two to make sure there are no other lost souls in need of your help.
objectives: Obtain a pumpkin cookie from the Phantoms' Feast, and present it to the Adventurers' Guild investigator.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Ready to proceed with our investigation, are you? Excellent. Allow me to introduce you to our esteemed collaborator. This is Marke, a specialist in matters of the occult dispatched by the guild to assist in apprehending the nefarious Papa Gruff.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: A pleasure to make your acquaintance.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: Before we go any further, I wish to ensure that I have a grasp on the situation as it stands. If it's quite all right with you, pray share all you have learned about our quarry thus far.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: I see...quite fascinating, indeed. Yes, it was all as I read in that tome...

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: Ah, my apologies. I tend to get lost in my own thoughts sometimes. Allow me to begin by giving you a brief introduction to the so-called “Night of Devilry”─or, at least, as I understand it.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: It is said that during All Saints' Wake, the saints are invited to banquets in the heavens each and every night.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: At such time, the world below is left unprotected, and fiends summoned by the ogre pumpkinhead are free to wreak havoc on the defenseless denizens. One fiend in particular is said to be especially boisterous...

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: Aye, I speak of the one known as the Doomsday Clown.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: ...Though, perhaps, you know him better as “the Scarlet Snout” or “Papa Gruff”. In any event, they are all the same most nefarious personage. If the texts are to be believed, those who set foot in his domain are fated never to return.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: I say, just listening to this tale is enough to make my hair stand on end. That said, it seems we've quite a task on our hands even attempting to save his would-be victims. Have we no way of protecting ourselves once inside his lair?

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: I thought you would never ask. Pray feast your eyes on these fine creations of mine.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: I present to you two artifacts I have recreated by referencing a number of ancient tomes─together with some of my own personal touches, of course. Behold the fiendish lantern and a phial of warding holy water.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: But what do they do? You must wonder. Well, allow me to explain! First of all, the fiendish lantern emits a certain wavelength of light that voidsent absolutely detest.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: As for the warding holy water, it not only protects the holder's soul from being stolen, but also enables one to rescue the lost souls of others and return them to their mortal frames.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: I have not yet had the opportunity to test them and thus cannot vouch for their effectiveness, but I am very much hoping that they will serve you well─for both our sakes.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Wait, you mean there's no guarantee that—

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Ah, but it matters not. We face a potential crisis here, and beggars cannot be choosers in times of need. My friend, are you willing to put your faith in Marke's creations and do what needs be done?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Excellent! In the meantime, I shall do my best to ensure that the Scarlet Snout is not able to lure anyone else into his trap.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Speaking of the Snout, I have also heard another rumor─apparently, he has been handing out odd pumpkin cookies to those who attend his feast. Should you come into possession of such a confection, might you show it to me when you return?

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: Splendid. Before you go, allow me to furnish you with a linkpearl. Rest assured that I shall do my damnedest to support you from afar after you enter the dread clown's personal domain.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: Also, should you wish to know aught more about the items with which I have furnished you, just say the word.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: I shall return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre and see that no other frightening high jinks ensue. When you have found out what you would about the Snout, pray visit me there.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: How fascinating. Yes, most fascinating indeed...

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: Hm? Oh! It's you! My apologies, but I've not quite yet finished preparing for the festivities. Pray come back a bit later.

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: Ah, if it isn't my friend, Forename! Terribly sorry for the delay. Your timing couldn't be better─I'm pleased to report that I've finished preparing for the festivities.

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: Let my loyal harlequin guide know once you're ready, and he'll be more than happy to show you the way to the venue.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Phantoms' Feast seasonal instance.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To join the feast, speak with the harlequin guide under the Bentbranch Meadows bridge or in the Acorn Orchard.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Phantoms' Feast is a light party instance (four players). There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Parties that register for the instance with less than four members will be filled out automatically via the matching system.

dialogue.name: MARKE
dialogue.text: Ah, is there something you'd like to know?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you ask about?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: The Scarlet Snout.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: The fiendish lantern.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: The warding holy water.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: It is said that during All Saints' Wake, the saints are invited to banquets in the heavens each and every night.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: At such time, the world below is left unprotected, and fiends summoned by the ogre pumpkinhead are free to wreak havoc on the defenseless denizens. One fiend in particular is said to be especially boisterous...

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: Aye, I speak of the one known as the Doomsday Clown.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: ...Though, perhaps, you know him better as “the Scarlet Snout” or “Papa Gruff”. In any event, they are all the same most nefarious personage. If the texts are to be believed, those who set foot in his domain are fated never to return. How utterly terrifying!

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: This is why I fashioned my greatest creations: the fiendish lantern and the warding holy water. Inspired by what I gleaned from many an ancient tome, I have no doubt that they will serve you well in your quest to quash the Snout's nefarious plot.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: The fiendish lantern emits a wavelength of light that voidsent absolutely detest.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: Should you encounter any such fiends, pray put it to good use. I have no doubt it will serve you well.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: The warding holy water not only protects the holder's soul from being stolen, but also enables one to rescue the lost souls of others and return them to their mortal frames.

dialogue.name: MARK
dialogue.text: I have afforded you with a full phial, so please do not hesitate to use it should you come across any souls in need of succor.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are! Glad to see you returned from the spectral realm in one piece! I say, did Marke's inventions provide adequate aid?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Relieved I am to hear that! Small wonder the man came so highly recommended. And of course, I must thank you for risking life and limb to put them to use. Thanks to you, we can rest assured that the souls of the Gridanian people are safe from the fiend's trickery.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: I am full glad to finally lay my eyes upon this rumored cookie as well. Oh, and just to be safe, I took the liberty of advising the other invitees not to attend the feast...for their own good.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: I am concerned, however, that some of them did not seem so keen on heeding my instructions. Should you find any that have gone on ahead, pray save as many of them as you can.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Now that we know that Marke's creations can be relied upon, there is no reason to think we should not be able to rescue everyone from the Snout's clutches.

dialogue.name: PIERROTCHILD
dialogue.text: P-Papa! Wh-Where have all my new friends gone? <sob>

dialogue.name: PIERROTMOTHER
dialogue.text: Don't worry, sweetheart. Father will sort this all out.

dialogue.name: PIERROTMOTHER
dialogue.text: What the heck were those abominable trinkets, anyway!? And why did you not warn me that one of those despicable adventurers might crash our party!?

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: Oh, my beloved! Pray calm your heart. That adventurer ladyfellow was one thing, but rest assured that none of our ordinary guests will be equipped with such artifacts. We shall have our fun soon enough─believe you me!

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: What's more, I found someone who has volunteered to help us in our quest. They say the best approach is to just wander around the town shouting out invitations to anyone within earshot.

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: Why, just imagine how many guests they'll manage to lure here with such a bold approach!

dialogue.name: PIERROTFATHER
dialogue.text: Now, listen to me. Be sure to invite as many people as possible, all right? The more terror, the better, I say!

dialogue.name: PIERROTFAMILYSERVANT04520
dialogue.text: Your wish is my command, Master Gruff!

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: Heh heh... This will be a fine All Saints' Wake, indeed. That said, I do wonder who this mysterious new acquaintance might be...?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: Rest assured that I will be keeping close watch on the Scarlet Snout to make sure that his baleful plans never come to fruition.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: I will see to it that none of his expected visitors attend his banquet. Then, when he comes out to ascertain what has gone amiss...we will strike with an expert team assembled by the Adventurers' Guild, putting an end to the villainy once and for all.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR04520
dialogue.text: In the meantime, I ask that you pray go and rescue anyone the Snout has already managed to lure into his domain. That would doubtless encourage him to abandon his scheme even sooner.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can now attempt the Phantoms' Feast seasonal instance again by speaking with the harlequin guide in either Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre or the Acorn Orchard.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Successfully completing the instance will earn you a pumpkin cookie.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can exchange cookies for items and equipment by speaking with the shady smock in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can also speak with the genial guiser, and join the marvelous masquerade in the Haunted Manor.
